title: Maximum Finder
code:
§begin find_max
  x ← 15
  y ← 23
  §if x ⊗ y
    §transmit x
  §else
    §transmit y
  §end_if
§end
solution_description: outputs the larger of two numbers
hints: The program chooses between two values
Which number is larger, x or y?
The program outputs the maximum value
